title.rendered: 20% Off Melissa & Doug Toys + Fall Reading Picks

content.rendered:
20% Off Melissa & Doug Toys

One of our favorite promotions is back! During the month of October, receive 20% off Melissa & Doug toys and educational products. We have a wide selection… from plush animals to wooden train sets to puzzles to crafts. Get your Christmas shopping done early! This Melissa & Doug sponsored sale only happens once each year, so stock up. Every Gottwals Books location is full of great items, and the selection varies by store.

Staff Picks: Bestselling Series Authors

Summer is for quick beach reads and thrillers, but FALL is our favorite time to settle in to a series. Some of our bestselling series authors are Lilian Jackson Braun, C.S. Lewis, Darren Shan, Terry Brooks, and W.E.B. Griffin. Come in and talk to our associates for recommendations. We will have plenty of options, and they are always at a reasonable price.

Ellijay: Opening Saturday, October 17!

Peachtree City

We’re gearing up for Peachtree City! The store is scheduled to open Monday, October 26. Stay tuned for more photos and updates.
